chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x'_1 := cA_1 m one x' in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x'_1 y' -> ~ expf (L m zero x' y') x_1 y -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) x'_1 y' -> nf m1 = nf m2

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
nf = fix nf (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0%Z | I m0 _ _ _ => (nf m0 + 1)%Z | L m0 zero x y => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in (nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1))%Z | L m0 one x y => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in (nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1))%Z end : fmap -> Z
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
nf_L0L0_V : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x'_1 := cA_1 m one x' in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x'_1 y' -> expf (L m zero x' y') x_1 y -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) x'_1 y' -> nf m1 = nf m2
nf_L0L0_IV : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x'_1 := cA_1 m one x' in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x'_1 y' -> ~ expf (L m zero x' y') x_1 y -> expf (L m zero x y) x'_1 y' -> nf m1 = nf m2
nf_L0L0_III : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x'_1 := cA_1 m one x' in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x'_1 y' -> expf (L m zero x' y') x_1 y -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) x'_1 y' -> nf m1 = nf m2
nf_L0L0_II : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x'_1 := cA_1 m one x' in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x'_1 y' -> expf (L m zero x' y') x_1 y -> expf (L m zero x y) x'_1 y' -> nf m1 = nf m2
nf_L0L0_I : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x'_1 := cA_1 m one x' in expf m x_1 y -> expf m x'_1 y' -> expf (L m zero x' y') x_1 y -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) x'_1 y' -> nf m1 = nf m2
inv_hmap_L0L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) one x' y' in let m2 := L (L m one x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> inv_hmap m2
inv_hmap_L0L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> inv_hmap m2
B1_L0_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m one x y) zero x' y' in inv_hmap m1 -> B m1 one x = L m zero x' y'
B0_L1_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) one x' y' in inv_hmap m1 -> B m1 zero x = L m one x' y'
B0_L0_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in inv_hmap m1 -> B m1 zero x = L m zero x' y'

expf_expf_L0_4_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m y z -> expf (L m zero x y) y z
expf_expf_L0_2_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_6 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y t -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf (L m zero x y) z t
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_not_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in expf m x_1 y < -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) y x0
expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_5 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z /\ expf m y t \/ expf m x_1 t /\ expf m y z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_5bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z /\ expf m x_1 t \/ expf m y z /\ expf m y t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
between_expf_L0_4_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m y_0_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z

```  
intros m x y x' y' m1 m2 H_inv H_x1y H_not_x1y' H_not_x1y H_not_x'y' H_nexpf_x1y H_expf_x'y'.
unfold m1, m2. rewrite nf_L0L0_II with (x:=x)(y:=y)(x':=x')(y':=y')(m:=m) in H_nexpf_x1y.
rewrite nf_L0L0_IV with (x:=x')(y:=y')(x':=x)(y':=y)(m:=m) in H_not_x'y'.
unfold nf. simpl. repeat rewrite H_nexpf_x1y.
repeat rewrite H_not_x1y'. repeat rewrite H_not_x1y. reflexivity.
```

original: intros m x y x' y' m1 m2 H_inv H_x1y H_not_x1y' H_not_x1y H_not_x'y' H_nexpf_x1y H_expf_x'y'. unfold m1, m2. rewrite nf_L0L0_II with (x:=x)(y:=y)(x':=x')(y':=y')(m:=m) in H_nexpf_x1y. rewrite nf_L0L0_IV with (x:=x')(y:=y')(x':=x)(y':=y)(m:=m) in H_not_x'y'. unfold nf. simpl. repeat rewrite H_nexpf_x1y. repeat rewrite H_not_x1y'. repeat rewrite H_not_x1y. reflexivity.
